attributes.action: Stop the relationship with the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As many people of the UK know by now that the USA have done nothing good for us since they got freedom. They have gotten us into wars we didnt need ridiculous battles and they still dont say im very sorry or apologize, Nop we just get told that we are rude words that I will not type. I am simply saying that we should not have a relationship with the USA for a while and see how we go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
